com.google.gwt.dev.resource.impl
Class PathPrefixSet

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.dev.resource.impl.PathPrefixSet

public class PathPrefixSet
extends java.lang.Object

Combines the information conveyed about a set of path prefixes to quickly answer questions regarding an entire set of path prefixes.

Constructor Detail

PathPrefixSet

public PathPrefixSet()
Method Detail

add

public boolean add(PathPrefix prefix)
Parameters:
prefix - the prefix to add
Returns:
true if the prefix was not already in the set; otherwise, it merged with one having the same prefix, which has the effect of expanding the filter (the merge works as union(includes - skips) - union(excludes))

getSize

public int getSize()

includesDirectory

public boolean includesDirectory(java.lang.String dirPath)
Determines whether or not a directory might have resources that could be included. The primary purpose of this method is to allow ClassPathEntry subclasses to avoid descending into directory hierarchies that could not possibly contain resources that would be included by includesResource(String)

Parameters:
dirPath - must be a valid abstract directory name (must not be an empty string)
Returns:
true if some PathPrefix allows the directory

includesResource

public PathPrefix includesResource(java.lang.String resourceAbstractPathName)
Determines whether or not a given resource should be allowed by this path prefix set and the corresponding filters.

Parameters:
resourceAbstractPathName -
Returns:
matching PathPrefix if the resource matches some specified prefix and any associated filters don't exclude it. Otherwise, returns null. So it returns null if either no prefixes match or the most specific prefix excludes the resource.

includesResource

public PathPrefix includesResource(java.lang.String resourceAbstractPathName,
                                   java.lang.String[] parts)
Implementation of includesDirectory(String).
